coloredTexts.text: In the Oceans you can find Shipwrecks that can contain maps to true Buried Treasures.
A desert and a snowy forest together!? Who make this map?
Hope the Fisherman sails soon, I need some ink sacks.
Hello adventurer, hope you get your map ready for exploration.
Circular? What a ridiculous theory about our planet.
Don't touch anything please, you could ruin the ink.
